description: Irish police will be able to close restaurants and pubs in Ireland not adhering to Covid-19 regulations.
title: Coronavirus: Garda¨ª get power to close pubs breaching Covid-19 rules
title_page: Coronavirus: Garda¨ª get power to close pubs breaching Covid-19 rules - BBC News
maintext: On Saturday, the Department of Health in Northern Ireland announced that there were 104 new cases of Covid-19 diagnosed during the previous 24 hours. The number of deaths is not updated at the weekend.
